attributes.action: Ban the advert called "Mastication for the Nation" before the nation revolts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This surely needs to be banned on the premise that it is without doubt the most annoying thing on television. It is surely some evil plot to finally rot our brains through childish, infantile advertising. Please - before the Trident factories are overrun by revolutionaries.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
